thread.title: Drew Brees Press Conference Prior To Falcons Game
thread.title_full: Drew Brees Press Conference Prior To Falcons Game

author: Steve Peloquin
title: Drew Brees Press Conference Prior To Falcons Game
text:
Drew Brees Press Conference Prior To Falcons Game By Steve Peloquin October 14, 2015 5:11 AM (Photo by Rich Schultz /Getty Images) 

New Orleans Saints quarterback Drew Brees met with media members on Tuesday night, two days before he and his teammates take on the Atlanta Falcons in an NFC South showdown at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome in New Orleans, La. 
The Saints will enter the match-up at 1-4, while the Falcons are currently unbeaten at 5-0. 
Kick-off time is scheduled for 7:25 pm.
